entry.title: Lab 01: VM, GitHub and Azure Setup
entry.summary: Environment setup workflow including Azure VM, GitHub configuration, and initial deployment setup.

entry.summary: Resume development using semantic HTML structure with improved styling and content organization.

entry.title: Lab 04: RSS and Atom Feeds
